articles.author: Silvia Foster-Frau, David Nakamura, Molly Hennessy-Fiske
articles.title: What ending birthright citizenship could look like in the U.S. - The Washington Post
articles.description: Legal experts say the undocumented population would grow and that all Americans would be impacted if Trump’s order ending birthright citizenship takes effect.
articles.content:
A month and a half before she was due to give birth, Duilanyela started having contractions andwas rushed to the hospital, where doctors performed an emergency C-section and hysterectomy.
